DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria expose population : Postmenarchal female treat chemotherapy age 1135 year , uterus least one ovary Inclusion Criteria unexposed population : healthy postmenarchal female prior plan exposure chemotherapy age 1135 , uterus least one ovary regular menstrual cycle ( 2135 day ) Exclusion criterion subject : positive pregnancy test enrollment lactation within previous 1 month , previous treatment chemotherapy radiation therapy exception radioactive iodine thyroid cancer . previous diagnosis illness associate premature ovarian failure ( Turner 's syndrome , Fragile X permutation carrier ) endocrine disorder associate irregular menstrual cycle ( Cushing 's disease , Thyroid disease , hyperprolactinemia , congenital adrenal hyperplasia ) . Additional exclusion unexposed population : history infertility , define least 12 month unprotected intercourse without conception polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS )
